page.title: 20MY HOUSE
page.content:
My house is a seni-detached and has a garage.The house has three bedrooms , one bathroom and a loft.Downstairs we have a large livingroom witha dinning area at the end of the room.The kitchen is very small.In the back yard there are concrete flags and then a large patch of grass.The front is where the flowers are grown and there is a lawn.We have a patio where the dinning table is.The house is about one and a quarter miles from the centre of Batley. The livingroon is all blue with a blue settee and carpet and curtains. The fire place is made out of stone and cobbles and the fire is made out of bronze. When we bought it ,it cost
Â£18,000 nearly two years ago.The doors are white and the side doors are blue. Wehave a hut where we store junk.
